intension: Create a festive and fun Cinco de Mayo advertisement featuring men in sombreros eating tacos. Include the text 'cinco de mayo' and 'HAPPY' with the message 'long live Mexico'. The ad should promote tacos and Mexican cuisine.
globalcaption: The image features a group of five men standing next to each other, each holding a large taco in their hands. They are all dressed in sombreros, which adds a festive touch to the scene. The tacos are placed in various positions, with some held higher and others lower, creating a visually appealing arrangement. The men appear to be enjoying their time together, possibly celebrating Cinco de Mayo or another special occasion.
keywords: army, celebration, cinco de mayo, festival, fiesta, holiday, may, mexican, party, sombrero, taco, food, cincodemayo, ad, instagram, ig, insta, advertisement, entertainment

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a colorful taco with a variety of toppings, including meat, cheese, and vegetables. The taco is placed on a white background, making it stand out. The toppings are arranged in a visually appealing manner, with the cheese and vegetables spread across the taco, and the meat placed in the center. The taco appears to be freshly prepared and ready to be enjoyed

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a group of five men standing next to each other, each wearing a sombrero. They are holding a large taco together, with each person holding a different part of the taco. The taco is placed in the center of the scene, and the men are positioned around it, showcasing their shared interest in the delicious meal
